modules.name: Admin
modules.description: Remote device configuration and management. Allows changing settings, reading device info, and rebooting nodes over the mesh network.

modules.name: ATAK Plugin
modules.description: Integration with ATAK (Android Team Awareness Kit) for tactical situational awareness. Enables military/emergency response coordination.

modules.name: Audio
modules.description: Audio codec support for voice communication over the mesh.

modules.name: Bluetooth
modules.description: Bluetooth connectivity for pairing with phones and apps. Required for mobile app communication on most devices.

modules.name: Canned Messages
modules.description: Pre-defined quick messages that can be sent with button presses. Useful for devices with limited input (no keyboard). Includes on-screen keyboard for some devices.

modules.name: Detection Sensor
modules.description: Motion/presence detection sensor integration. Broadcasts detection events when sensors trigger (PIR, door switches, etc.).

modules.name: Environmental Sensor
modules.description: Environmental monitoring sensors including temperature, humidity, pressure, air quality, and light sensors. Broadcasts telemetry data to the mesh.

modules.name: External Notification
modules.description: Drive external LEDs, buzzers, and speakers for notifications. Plays RTTTL ringtones and can control GPIO outputs when messages arrive.

modules.name: GPS
modules.description: GPS receiver support for position tracking and sharing. Disabling prevents position broadcasts but the device still relays position packets for other nodes.

modules.name: Health Telemetry
modules.description: Heart rate and health monitoring sensors (like MAX30102 pulse oximeter). Broadcasts health metrics to the mesh.

modules.name: I2C
modules.description: I2C bus support for external sensors and peripherals. Required for most sensor modules and OLED displays.

modules.name: Input Broker
modules.description: Input device handling (buttons, encoders, touchscreens). Routes button presses to appropriate modules like Canned Messages.

modules.name: MQTT
modules.description: MQTT client for cloud integration. Publishes mesh messages to MQTT brokers and subscribes to receive cloud messages. Enables IoT integration and remote monitoring.

modules.name: Neighbor Info
modules.description: Broadcasts information about directly-reachable neighbor nodes including signal strength (SNR). Helps build mesh topology maps and track network health.

modules.name: Pax Counter
modules.description: Counts nearby WiFi and Bluetooth devices for crowd density estimation. Useful for people-counting in public spaces.

modules.name: PKI
modules.description: Public Key Infrastructure for enhanced security and key verification between nodes.

modules.name: Power Monitor
modules.description: Battery and power monitoring hardware support (INA260, INA219, etc.). Tracks voltage, current, and power consumption.

modules.name: Power FSM
modules.description: Power management finite state machine. Handles sleep modes, power state transitions, and battery optimization.

modules.name: Power Telemetry
modules.description: Broadcasts battery voltage, current, and power consumption data to the mesh. Different from Power Monitor which is the hardware interface.

modules.name: Power Stress
modules.description: Power consumption testing tool. Stresses the device to measure battery life under various transmission patterns. For development/testing only.

modules.name: Range Test
modules.description: Mesh range and signal quality testing. Sends periodic packets and logs signal strength (RSSI), SNR, and packet loss statistics to a file.

modules.name: Remote Hardware
modules.description: Remote GPIO control over the mesh. Read/write digital pins, read ADC values, and control hardware on remote nodes.

modules.name: Screen
modules.description: OLED/E-Ink display support. Shows messages, node info, and status on screen. Disabling saves power but removes visual feedback.

modules.name: Serial
modules.description: Serial port communication for sensors and external devices. Can relay serial data over the mesh and supports NMEA GPS bridging.

modules.name: Store & Forward
modules.description: Message store-and-forward server for offline nodes. Router devices can cache messages and replay them when distant nodes reconnect. Requires PSRAM.

modules.name: Text Messaging
modules.description: Send and receive text messages between nodes. Displays messages on OLED screens and forwards to connected apps. **Important:** Disabling prevents sending/receiving but the node still relays messages for others.

modules.name: Traceroute
modules.description: Network path tracing tool. Shows the route packets take through the mesh, including all intermediate hops and hop limits.

modules.name: Timezone
modules.description: Timezone database support for local time display. Allows devices to show correct local time based on GPS position.

modules.name: Waypoint
modules.description: Share and display waypoints (points of interest) on the mesh. Shows waypoints on screen and in apps for navigation and location marking.

modules.name: Web Server
modules.description: Built-in web interface for device configuration. Automatically excluded if WiFi is disabled.

modules.name: WiFi
modules.description: WiFi connectivity for network access, web server, and MQTT. Disabling saves power but removes WiFi features including the web interface.
